s0620.chinese: 四十一年夏，攻魏，取邢丘、懷。
s0620.literal: Forty-first year summer, attacked Wei, took Xingqiu, Huai.
s0620.idiomatic: Forty-first year summer, attacked Wei, took Xingqiu, Huai.

s0621.chinese: 四十二年，安國君為太子。
s0621.literal: Forty-second year, An Guo Jun became crown prince.
s0621.idiomatic: Forty-second year, An Guo Jun became crown prince.

s0622.chinese: 十月，宣太后薨，葬芷陽酈山。
s0622.literal: Tenth month, Xuan Taihou died, buried at Zhiyang Lishan.
s0622.idiomatic: Tenth month, Xuan Taihou died, buried at Zhiyang Lishan.

s0623.literal: Ninth month, Rang Hou was exiled to Tao.
s0623.idiomatic: Ninth month, Rang Hou was exiled to Tao.

s0624.chinese: 四十三年，武安君白起攻韓，拔九城，斬首五萬。
s0624.literal: Forty-third year, Wu An Jun Bai Qi attacked Han, took nine cities, beheaded 50,000.
s0624.idiomatic: Forty-third year, Wu An Jun Bai Qi attacked Han, took nine cities, beheaded 50,000.

s0625.chinese: 四十四年，攻韓南（郡）［陽］，取之。
s0625.literal: Forty-fourth year, attacked Han Nanyang, took it.
s0625.idiomatic: Forty-fourth year, attacked Han Nanyang, took it.

s0626.chinese: 四十五年，五大夫賁攻韓，取十城。
s0626.literal: Forty-fifth year, Wu Da Fu Ben attacked Han, took ten cities.
s0626.idiomatic: Forty-fifth year, Wu Da Fu Ben attacked Han, took ten cities.

s0627.chinese: 葉陽君悝出之國，未至而死。
s0627.literal: Ye Yang Jun Kui was exiled from the state, died before arriving.
s0627.idiomatic: Ye Yang Jun Kui was exiled from the state, died before arriving.

s0628.chinese: 四十七年，秦攻韓上黨，上黨降趙，秦因攻趙，趙發兵擊秦，相距。
s0628.literal: Forty-seventh year, Qin attacked Han's Shangdang, Shangdang surrendered to Zhao, Qin then attacked Zhao, Zhao sent troops to attack Qin, confronted each other.
s0628.idiomatic: Forty-seventh year, Qin attacked Han's Shangdang, Shangdang surrendered to Zhao, Qin then attacked Zhao, Zhao sent troops to attack Qin, confronted each other.

s0629.chinese: 秦使武安君白起擊，大破趙於長平，四十餘萬盡殺之。
s0629.literal: Qin sent Wu An Jun Bai Qi to attack, greatly defeated Zhao at Changping, over 400,000 all killed.
s0629.idiomatic: Qin sent Wu An Jun Bai Qi to attack, greatly defeated Zhao at Changping, over 400,000 all killed.

s0630.chinese: 四十八年十月，韓獻垣雍。
s0630.literal: Forty-eighth year tenth month, Han offered Yuanyong.
s0630.idiomatic: Forty-eighth year tenth month, Han offered Yuanyong.

s0631.literal: Qin army divided into three armies.
s0631.idiomatic: Qin army divided into three armies.

s0633.chinese: 王龁將伐趙（武安）皮牢，拔之。
s0633.literal: Wang He led attack on Zhao Pijiao, captured it.
s0633.idiomatic: Wang He led attack on Zhao Pijiao, captured it.

s0634.chinese: 司馬梗北定太原，盡有韓上黨。
s0634.literal: Sima Geng pacified Taiyuan to the north, completely possessed Han's Shangdang.
s0634.idiomatic: Sima Geng pacified Taiyuan to the north, completely possessed Han's Shangdang.

s0635.literal: First month, troops dismissed, again guarded Shangdang.
s0635.idiomatic: First month, troops dismissed, again guarded Shangdang.

s0636.chinese: 其十月，五大夫陵攻趙邯鄲。
s0636.literal: That tenth month, Wu Da Fu Ling attacked Zhao's Handan.
s0636.idiomatic: That tenth month, Wu Da Fu Ling attacked Zhao's Handan.

s0637.chinese: 四十九年正月，益發卒佐陵。
s0637.literal: Forty-ninth year first month, increased troops to assist Ling.
s0637.idiomatic: Forty-ninth year first month, increased troops to assist Ling.

s0638.literal: Ling fought poorly, dismissed, Wang He replaced as general.
s0638.idiomatic: Ling fought poorly, dismissed, Wang He replaced as general.

s0639.chinese: 其十月，將軍張唐攻魏，為蔡尉捐弗守，還斬之。
s0639.literal: That tenth month, General Zhang Tang attacked Wei, because Cai Wei Quan did not defend, returned and beheaded him.
s0639.idiomatic: That tenth month, General Zhang Tang attacked Wei, because Cai Wei Quan did not defend, returned and beheaded him.
